definition[0]: to make an area separate by drawing a line around it, putting a rope around it etc
example[0]: The competitors’ arena had been marked off with cones.
definition[1]: to make a mark on a list to show that something has been done or completed
example[1]: Mark off each of the names on the list as I call them out.
definition[2]: to make something or someone different from other things or people of a similar type
example[2]: Sara’s natural flair for languages marked her off from the other students.
